WorkItem.Description:
After upgrading to 1.0RC I get the following error during build in VS2013:

VSTSC : error TS5015: Build: Unsupported locale: 'en-US'.

Comments.Message: Could you share the file/project that is causing this issue? Or is this happening even for a fresh TypeScript project? Please re-open this issue with more info so we can track down what's happening here.
I had to uninstall TypeScript, so I can return to previous version 0.9.5. When I have upgraded to 1.0RC now the problem is  gone.
